definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
ecliptic line/intersection of the ecliptic with the moon's orbit plane

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们请了一位税务咨询师，以便我们少交点税。

sentences.english: Your position distance 400metres from intersection of reference line.
sentences.chinese: 你船的位置距参照线交点400米。

sentences.english: The North Pole is the spot on Earth’s globe that marks the northern end of an imaginary stick Earth spins around.
sentences.chinese: 北极是地球表面与假想的自转轴相交的北交点。

sentences.english: This special point is an interesting one.
Our company employed a tax consultant so that we can pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我们请了一位税务咨询师，以便我们少交点税。

sentences.english: From the cross points through the elbow shielded region, the geometric attenuation can be rapidly determined in advance.
sentences.chinese: 由这肘形屏蔽领域的交点可快速预测辐射屏蔽衰减率。

sentences.english: Sandel’s popularity in Asia reflects the intersection of three trends.
sentences.chinese: 桑代尔在亚洲的人望，反映出三种趋势的交点。

sentences.english: Based on the analysis, determine the unicity of point of tangency and point of intersection.
sentences.chinese: 基于在解析几何的基础上确定了切线和交点的唯一性。

sentences.english: This transit often brings about new dimensions in life.
sentences.chinese: 行运北交点与上升点呈合相往往为人生带来新层面。

sentences.english: Choose two entities to be split at their intersection point.
sentences.chinese: 选取两个图元在其交点处分割。

sentences.english: In this paper, the tracing and the calculation method of the point of intersection of isopleth and net line are developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了等值线与网格线交点的追踪和计算方法。

sentences.english: Construct two mutually orthogonal tangents of the deltoid. Where do they meet?
sentences.chinese: 画出三角线两条正交的切线段，它们的交点在那里？

sentences.english: An explicit functional relation of the point position variance of angular resection with observation value was derived.
sentences.chinese: 推导了测角后交点位方差与观测值的显函数关系式。

sentences.english: We would like two parallel lines, very near and far, no point of intersection.
sentences.chinese: 我们就像两条平行线一样，很近又很远，没有交点。

sentences.english: The equilibrium price occurs at the intersection of the supply and demand curves.
sentences.chinese: 市场均衡决定于供给曲线，需求曲线的交点。

sentences.english: For example, you can roll out slices or any intersections of slices.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您可以转出切片或切片的任意交点。

definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
starting point or ending point (in stories etc)/end point (math)
angle of intersection/angle at which two lines meet
